cause.description: Most people go through life polluting river beds and throwing their trash out of thier gas guzzling car windows like they dont have a care in the world. Then those people are are most likely a part of another group that would rather poach for the money, or kill indiginos and endangered animal because its more convinent then having to share the land with them.This group is for all the people that rather give up some of the luxuries they have then see an animal or plant become extinct or endangered because of selfish human behvior 1. save the http://earthsendangered.com/full_list.asp 2. with a special emphasis on the gorrila, chinook salmon, Florida manatee, wolfs, Whales, tigers, elephants. Rhinos, and the Snow Leopard 3. the Golopogose Islands are not a tourist attraction 4. Humans were not the first Animals on earth
cause.mission: try to inform people on what species are endangered and to remined them that animals are a lot more important to the world then most people think
cause.name: Protect Indigenous and Endanged Species
